snippet: The Oakland Athletics acquired shortstop Yunel Escobar and the versatile infielder Ben Zobrist, a two-time All-Star, from the Tampa Bay Rays on Saturday for catcher John Jaso and two minor leaguers.
abstract: Oakland Athletics acquire shortstop Yunel Escobar and infielder Ben Zobrist from Tampa Bay Rays for catcher John Jaso and two minor leaguers.
lead_paragraph: The Oakland Athletics acquired shortstop Yunel Escobar and the versatile infielder Ben Zobrist, a two-time All-Star, from the Tampa Bay Rays on Saturday for catcher John Jaso and two minor leaguers.

headline.main: A’s Add Depth in Infield in Trade With the Rays
headline.print_headline: A’s Add Depth in Infield in Trade With the Rays
